input_data:
Subject: Can't log in after password reset
Body: I reset my password yesterday and now I keep getting 'invalid credentials'. I've tried three browsers. I'm on the enterprise plan and my whole team is locked out.
Customer tier: enterprise

Subject: Dashboard charts not loading
Body: Since this morning the analytics dashboard shows a spinner forever. Other pages work fine. We rely on this for daily standups.
Customer tier: pro

Subject: How do I export data to CSV?
Body: Hi, I'm new to the platform. Is there a way to export my project data as a CSV file? I couldn't find it in the docs.
Customer tier: free

Subject: Charged twice this month
Body: I see two charges of $49.99 on my credit card statement for January. Please refund the duplicate charge. Account email: jane@example.com
Customer tier: pro

Subject: URGENT - all data missing from production workspace
Body: Our entire production workspace appears empty. All projects, files, and settings are gone. This is affecting 200+ users at our company. We need immediate assistance.
Customer tier: enterprise

Subject: Would love dark mode
Body: Any plans to add dark mode? I work late hours and the bright white UI is tough on the eyes. Love the product otherwise!
Customer tier: free

Subject: API returns 500 on bulk upload
Body: When I POST more than 50 items to /api/v2/items/bulk, I consistently get a 500 Internal Server Error. Payloads under 50 work fine. Here's the curl command: [redacted]. This is blocking our migration.
Customer tier: enterprise

Subject: Cancel my subscription
Body: Please cancel my pro plan effective immediately. I don't need the service anymore.
Customer tier: pro

Subject: MFA not sending codes
Body: I enabled MFA last week and now the app isn't sending verification codes to my phone. I can't access my account at all.
Customer tier: pro

Subject: Integration with Jira?
Body: We're evaluating your tool and Jira integration is a must-have for us. Do you support it, or is it on the roadmap? We'd be signing up 50 seats.
Customer tier: enterprise

Subject: Slow page loads
Body: Pages take 8-10 seconds to load for the past 3 days. Other websites are fine so it's not my internet. Makes the tool basically unusable.
Customer tier: pro

Subject: Invoice address change
Body: Can you update our billing address to 123 New St, Suite 400, New York, NY 10001? We moved offices last month.
Customer tier: enterprise

Subject: Possible unauthorized access to my account
Body: I just received an email saying my account was accessed from an IP in Russia. I'm in the US and didn't log in at that time. Please investigate immediately.
Customer tier: pro

Subject: Webhook payloads missing fields
Body: The webhook for 'item.updated' events used to include the 'modified_by' field but it's been missing since last Thursday. Our downstream automation depends on it.
Customer tier: enterprise

Subject: What's the difference between Pro and Enterprise?
Body: Hi team, I'm trying to decide which plan to go with. Can someone walk me through the key differences, especially around SSO and audit logs?
Customer tier: free

Subject: Typo on the pricing page
Body: On your pricing page it says 'unlimted' instead of 'unlimited' under the Enterprise column. Minor thing but thought you'd want to know.
Customer tier: free

Subject: Need SSO SAML setup help
Body: We just upgraded to Enterprise and need to configure SAML SSO with Okta. The docs are a bit sparse — can someone help us set this up? We have 300 users waiting to onboard.
Customer tier: enterprise

Subject: Bulk export feature request
Body: We need the ability to export all projects at once as a ZIP. Currently we have to export one by one, which is painful with 150+ projects.
Customer tier: pro

Subject: Payment declined but service still active?
Body: My credit card expired and I got a 'payment declined' email, but my account still works. Just want to make sure I won't lose data — how long is the grace period?
Customer tier: pro

Subject: Complete platform outage
Body: Nothing loads. Getting 503 errors across all endpoints — UI, API, webhooks, everything. Multiple teams are dead in the water. This started 15 minutes ago.
Customer tier: enterprise
